nodes.text: The Ruugia system was a star system that was located within the Altier sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Expansion Region and the Slice. It was the origin point of the Ruugian noodles.
The Ruugia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-13.
